description: This Java class 'Actor' defines a domain model for representing actors (persons) in a system, with properties such as name, photo URL, color, and owner ID, and is mapped to a MongoDB collection with specific indexes.

classes.name: Actor
classes.description: Represents a person in the system, with attributes such as name, photo URL, color, owner ID, and timestamp metadata, mapped to a MongoDB document with indexes.

methods.name: Actor
methods.description: Default constructor for the Actor class.

methods.name: Actor
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize Actor with specific name, photo URL, color, and owner ID.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the Actor.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the Actor.

methods.name: getPhotoUrl
methods.description: Returns the photo URL associated with the Actor.

methods.name: getColorHex
methods.description: Returns the color hex code of the Actor.

methods.name: getOwnerId
methods.description: Returns the owner ID associated with the Actor.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the Actor record.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last modified timestamp of the Actor record.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the Actor.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the Actor.

methods.name: setPhotoUrl
methods.description: Sets the photo URL of the Actor.

methods.name: setColorHex
methods.description: Sets the color hex code of the Actor.

methods.name: setOwnerId
methods.description: Sets the owner ID for the Actor.
